Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Go Native Hyde Park in London (Paddington), you'll be convenient to Kensington Gardens and Royal Albert Hall. This 4-star apartment is close to Selfridges and Imperial College London.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 63 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and microwaves. Plasma televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as coffee/tea makers and washers/dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 63 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and microwaves. Plasma televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as coffee/tea makers and washers/dryers.

With a stay at Go Native Hyde Park in London (Paddington), you'll be convenient to Kensington Gardens and Royal Albert Hall. This 4-star apartment is close to Selfridges and Imperial College London.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Kensington Gardens - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Whiteleys Shopping Centre - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Hyde Park - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Hyde Park Speakers' Corner - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Marble Arch - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Kensington Palace - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Albert Memorial - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Portman Square - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Royal Albert Hall - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Selfridges - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Wallace Collection - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Imperial College London - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Grosvenor Square - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Lord's Cricket Ground - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Madame Tussaud's Wax Museum - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 15.6 km / 9.7 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 19.6 km / 12.2 mi

The preferred airport for Go Native Hyde Park is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
